tool_description: Analyzes historical transaction data to identify spending patterns, trends, and anomalies across different time periods and categories to provide insights for budget planning.

transactions.description: Array of historical transaction records for analysis

analysis_period.description: Time period for pattern analysis: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly

pattern_types.description: Types of patterns to analyze: trends, seasonality, anomalies, category_shifts, frequency

minimum_transaction_count.description: Minimum number of transactions required per category for analysis

anomaly_sensitivity.description: Sensitivity for anomaly detection (0.0-1.0, higher values detect more anomalies)

error_messages: Insufficient transaction data: Provide at least 10 transactions for meaningful pattern analysis.
Invalid analysis period: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly].
Invalid pattern types: Use combinations of [trends, seasonality, anomalies, category_shifts, frequency].
Invalid transaction count: Minimum transaction count must be a positive integer.
Invalid sensitivity level: Anomaly sensitivity must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
usage: Provide historical transaction data and specify the analysis period. Optionally select specific pattern types to analyze and adjust sensitivity settings. The tool will identify spending patterns and provide actionable insights.

analysis_summary.description: Overall summary of spending pattern analysis results

identified_trends.description: Array of identified spending trends with descriptions

seasonal_patterns.description: Array of seasonal spending patterns by category

detected_anomalies.description: Array of spending anomalies with dates and descriptions

category_insights.description: Array of insights and recommendations for each spending category
